1.7 Warning and error conditions

column-number

Function

Summary

Returns a value that represents the column number in the result set.

Signature

column-number diagnostic => column-number

Arguments

diagnostic
An instance of <odbc-diagnostic>.

Values

column-number
An instance of <integer>.

Library

SQL-ODBC

Module

SQL-ODBC

Description

If the result of row-number is a valid row number in a result set, this function returns a value that represents the column number in the result set. Column numbers begin at 1 rather than 0.

OLE, COM, ActiveX and DBMS Reference - 31 MAR 2000
